### getParentPad() {#ac0292e8b8cfe9cfc5ecd1684f841955b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; llvm::FuncletPadInst::getParentPad () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Convenience accessors.

Return the outer EH-pad this funclet is nested within.

Note: This returns the associated <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/catchswitchinst">CatchSwitchInst</a> if this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/funcletpadinst">FuncletPadInst</a> is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/catchpadinst">CatchPadInst</a>.
